org.assistments.connector.service

Interface StudentClassService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StudentClassServiceImpl

    public interface StudentClassService
    This interface contains operations on ASSISTments student class and manages the associations between ASSISTments student class and Partner student class.
    Author:
    szhao

    • Method Detail

      • transferStudentClass

        java.lang.String transferStudentClass(java.lang.String studentClassName,
                                    java.lang.String partnerExternalRef,
                                    java.lang.String partnerAccessToken,
                                    java.lang.String note)
        Transfer the student class from Partner to ASSISTments. First it checks if partnerExternalRef already exists. If it doesn't, a new student class will be created inside ASSISTments. Store the association between new ASSISTments student class and Partner student class into database. If it does exist, external reference for the student class will be fetched from database.
        Parameters:
        studentClassName - -- Student class name
        partnerExternalRef - -- Partner external reference for the student class from Partner
        partnerAccessToken - -- Partner access token for the student class from Partner
        note - -- To keep extra information
        Returns:
        external reference for this student class from ASSISTments

      • createStudentClass

        java.lang.String createStudentClass(java.lang.String studentClassName,
                                  java.lang.String partnerExternalRef,
                                  java.lang.String partnerAccessToken,
                                  java.lang.String note)
        Create a new student class inside ASSISTments. Store the association between ASSISTments student class and Partner student class into database. It doesn't check if Partner student class already exists
        Parameters:
        studentClassName - -- Student class name
        partnerExternalRef - -- Partner external reference for the student class from Partner
        partnerAccessToken - -- Partner access token for the student class from Partner
        note - -- To keep extra information
        Returns:
        external reference for this student class from ASSISTments

      • enrollStudent

        boolean enrollStudent(java.lang.String studentRef,
                    java.lang.String studentClassRef)
        Enroll a student in a class
        Parameters:
        studentRef - -- external reference for the student from ASSISTments
        studentClassRef - -- external reference for the student class from ASSISTments
        Returns:
        true -- if student is enrolled successfully

      • getMembeship

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMembeship(java.lang.String studentClassRef)
        Get the members of a class
        Parameters:
        studentClassRef - -- External reference for the student class from ASSISTments
        Returns:
        a list of external reference for students from ASSISTments

      • find

        java.util.List<PartnerToAssistments> find(PartnerToAssistments.ColumnNames cn,
                                        java.lang.String value)
                                          throws ReferenceNotFoundException
        Find a certain external student class based on column name and value
        Parameters:
        cn - -- column name. It comes from table partner_to_assistments_links (partner_external_references)
        value - -- value for the column
        Returns:
        a list of external student
        Throws:
        ReferenceNotFoundException - -- If nothing is found, this exception will be thrown out.

      • isExternalStudentClassExists

        boolean isExternalStudentClassExists(java.lang.String partnerExternalRef)
        Check if Partner student class already exists based on partner_external_reference
        Parameters:
        partnerExternalRef - -- partner external reference for this student class from Partner.
        Returns:
        true -- if the external student class already exists.
